articles.content:

articles.title: Kapil Dev's lockdown look: World Cup winner shaves head, leaves fans in awe - India Today
articles.description: World Cup-winning pacer Chetan Sharma took to social media to reveal the new look of his friend and former teammate, Kapil Dev.
articles.content:
Former India captain and World Cup-winner Kapil Dev has gone for a makeover during the lockdown in the country due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
Kapil Dev has shaved his head and retained his beard, giving it a salt and pepper look. In photos shared by his forme… [+1776 chars]

articles.title: Magnus Carlsen Invitational: Carlsen beats Firouzja - Chessbase News
articles.description: After Monday's round, the Magnus Carlsen Invitational has a sole leader in the world champion himself. Magnus Carlsen got a 2½:1½ victory over 16-year-old Alireza Firouzja, thus gaining three points for the overall standings. Firouzja did get to win a game, w…
articles.content:
No hat-trick for Firouzja
A rivalry has developed the last weeks between Alireza Firouzja and Magnus Carlsen. The lack of over-the-board tournaments has put all the focus on online chess, a speccialty of the wunderkind. Carlsen is, of course, amazingly stron… [+6207 chars]
